title: Boyd Cycling’s Jocassee gravel wheels get wider, lighter 700c version
content:
Boyd cycling introduced the Jocassee gravel wheelset in early 2017, just as the gravel bike boom was finding its path. Initially offered in only a 650b option, the Jocassee offered a competitive edge for the gravel crowd. The wider 24mm internal width offered an excellent footprint and nicely cradled most 32-35mm tires. The 36mm deep […]

The post Boyd Cycling’s Jocassee gravel wheels get wider, lighter 700c version appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
